overview: A couple of young provincials, Louise and Julien, settle in the heart of the capital to take care of the Café du Cadran. They get to know the fauna of the regulars among them, racy, distinguished, Luigi who plays the violin at the Café de Paris. Louise listens to him a little too much, Julien becomes jealous and ends up killing his wife. Other bosses follow them very quickly.
title: Clockface Cafe
